summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of the southeasterly forty (40) feet of Lot Six (6), and all of Lot Seven (7), in Block Eleven (11), of the Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, as laid out on the claims of C.D. Boren and A.A. Denny, excepting the easterly nine (9) feet thereof taken by the City of Seattle for the widening of Third Avenue, as a site for a substation for the municipal light and power plant and system, and making an appropriation therefor.
